body:
Yes, it's that time again were I host a Cards Against Humanity Game for some people of the community.


So how this will work is that I will pick the first 5 people to A) Message me on Skype or B) Add Me on Skype and Message.

Skype: danfromyoutube

I hope some of you will come and play but yeah cya if you come and play

replies.body: EDIT: I will pick the first 9 people or less
